meanings.definition: The quality or state of being small in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The littleness of the toy car amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the littleness of the flower in her painting.
meanings.sent3: The littleness of the puppy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: In the vast forest, the tiny mushroom stood out for its littleness.
meanings.sent5: The littleness of the pebble made it easy to miss on the beach.

meanings.definition: A resemblance in appearance or character.
meanings.sent1: The littleness between the twins was striking.
meanings.sent2: There was a clear littleness between the two paintings.
meanings.sent3: The littleness between the actors made the audience do a double-take.
meanings.sent4: The littleness of the siblings was uncanny.
meanings.sent5: The littleness of the two sculptures was remarkable.
